name: Into the Unknow
description:
My name is Lautaro (27 years old) and this is my second game made. This is part of the second practice of a short game programming study I'm doing.

The game is simple and I have applied the knowledge that I have learned until then. I have also relied on various tutorials to help me get started but still I have given it my greatest dedication.

Hope you can enjoy it.

Any comments, bugs, doubts or ideas are welcome.

Thank you.

Language: spanish.

Platform: Android and PC.

Estimated playing time: 30 min - 1 hs.
